long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The detoX Browser Extension for Twitter is a tool designed to enhance Filipinos' Twitter experience by addressing the growing concern of hate speech and inappropriate content on the platform. This extension is tailor-made for users who want a safer and more positive Twitter environment, specifically focusing on mitigating hate speech related to Filipino politics, elections, and societal discussions.

Why You Should Install It:

Hate Speech Detection: Our extension employs an NLP model to detect hate speech and offensive content in tweets. By automatically identifying harmful language, it helps create a more respectful and inclusive Twitter space.

Enhanced User Experience: By filtering out hate speech and offensive content, you can enjoy Twitter without encountering harmful or distressing posts. It promotes a healthier online experience and protects your mental well-being.

Real-time Monitoring: The extension continuously monitors your Twitter feed, ensuring that new tweets are evaluated for hate speech as they appear. This real-time protection keeps you safe from harmful content without manual effort.

Community Building: Installing detoX demonstrates your commitment to a positive and respectful Twitter community. It encourages responsible online behavior and supports the platform's guidelines against hate speech.

User-Friendly Interface: Our extension is designed with simplicity in mind. It seamlessly integrates into your Twitter interface, offering an intuitive and easy-to-use experience.

Privacy First: Your privacy is a top priority. detoX processes tweets locally on your device, meaning your data remains private, and there's no need to worry about your personal information being shared.
